com.fluidops.iwb.ajax
Class SearchTextInput

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
          com.fluidops.iwb.ajax.SearchTextInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.fluidops.ajax.FEventListener
public class SearchTextInput
extends com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer

Search text input for IWB to perform keyword or structured search on the database. The user input is forwarded as query string to the search servlet, which supports both keyword queries and, if the user has proper privileges, SPARQL queries.

Author:
as, christian.huetter, andriy.nikolov
See Also:
SearchWidget
